fields.Title of Presentation: Structuring the Purchasing-Logistics Interface: A 'Scope of Responsibility" Perspective
fields.Conference/Meeting Name: 38th Annual Meeting of the Decision Science Institute
fields.Description/Abstract: The paper addresses the different ways in which firms structure the purchasing-logistics interface according to how responsibility is assigned across boundary-spanning activities, and whether there are performance implications for different types of structuring arrangements. Our analysis suggests that a taxonomy of three clusters emerges in a scope of responsibility context.
